content: क्लिशित, --क्लिष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Distressed, suffering pain or misery. {@--2@} Afflicted, tormented. {@--3@} Faded. {@--4@} Inconsistent, contradictory; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} माता मे वंध्या. {@--5@} Elaborate, artificial, (as a composition.). {@--6@} Put to shame. {@--7@} Wearied; hurt, injured. {@--8@} Being in a bad condition, worn. {@--9@} Marred, impaired; <ls>Ś. 5. 19</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 11</ls>; <ls>Ś. 6. 9</ls>; disordered; <ls>Ś. 7. 14.</ls> {@--10@} Dimmed, made faint; <ls>Ku. 2. 19.</ls> {@--11@} Injured, hurt; <ls>Ś. 6. 19.</ls> --ष्टं A contradictory statement.
